name: Astro-Miners
description:
The game that launches you into outer space to collect precious resources from asteroids!

Play through 20 different mission levels, or play against a friend in 'Head 2 Head' mode!

We are thrilled to be partnering with the Royal Ontario Museum to bring this exciting, educational title to kids of all ages. A portion of the proceeds from each sale goes to benefit the ROM.

Suit up, ASTRO MINERS!
